title: Li Tong has been busy doing

content.question: Li Tong has been busy doing which of the following?

choices.label: Preparing for upcoming exams and a music competition
Completing homework assignments and preparing for a sports competition
Preparing college applications and attending family events
Watching television and listening to music

content.answer: Preparing for upcoming exams and a music competition

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
